text: Jelena Mrdjenovich (born 24 June 1982) is a Canadian professional boxer. She is a three-weight world champion, having held the unified WBA and WBC female featherweight titles since 2016; the WBC female super featherweight title from 2005 to 2009; the WIBF lightweight title from 2006 to 2008; the WIBA featherweight title from 2011 to 2012; and the WBC female featherweight title twice between 2012 and 2015. As of September 2020, she is ranked as the world's second best active female by The Ring and fourth by BoxRec. In March 2017, a documentary was released about her career. ==Professional boxing record== {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:95%" |- ! !Result !Record !Opponent !Type !Round,
